title: Help! This Wi-Fi Hotspot is Worthless
text:
Published By: Huffington Post Business - Today 
Tim Kreth's Wi-Fi hotspot won't connect. Does he deserve a refund? Question: I recently ordered a $40 Wi-Fi hotspot from FreedomPop, a resel...
